Comprehensive Financial Solutions

As your fee-only fiduciary advisors, we provide transparent, conflict-free financial planning tailored to your unique goals and circumstances.

Wealth Management

Sophisticated investment portfolio management with tax-efficient strategies designed to preserve and grow your wealth across market cycles.

  • Portfolio diversification and rebalancing
  • Tax-loss harvesting strategies
  • Risk management and asset protection
Learn More

Retirement Income Planning

Strategic retirement planning to ensure you maintain your lifestyle while minimizing tax burden throughout your retirement years.

  • RRSP/RRIF optimization strategies
  • Pension maximization planning
  • Healthcare and long-term care planning
Learn More

Tax-Efficient Strategies

Advanced tax planning and optimization strategies to minimize your tax burden while maximizing after-tax investment returns.

  • Corporate tax structure optimization
  • Capital gains tax minimization
  • Income splitting strategies
Learn More

Estate Planning Strategies

  • Trust structure optimization

Learn More

Business Succession Planning

  • Business valuation and exit planning
  • Key person insurance strategies
  • Family succession coordination
Learn More

Why Choose WestGroup?

We're not just financial advisors—we're your partners in building generational wealth through transparent, fee-only fiduciary services that always put your interests first.

Fee-Only Fiduciary Standard

Unlike commission-based advisors, we're legally bound to act in your best interest. Our transparent fee structure means no hidden costs or conflicts of interest.

Tax-Efficient Expertise

Specialized in tax-loss harvesting, income splitting, and advanced strategies that can save high-net-worth clients thousands annually.

Comprehensive Planning

From retirement income planning to business succession strategies, we provide holistic financial solutions that adapt to your evolving needs.

WestGroup Financial - Your Trusted Vancouver Financial Advisors
WestGroup Financial Management Inc. is a registered investment advisor licensed in British Columbia. Securities offered through licensed representatives. Investment advisory services provided as a fiduciary. Past performance does not guarantee future results. All investments involve risk including potential loss of principal.

Serving: Vancouver, Surrey, Burnaby, Richmond, North Vancouver, West Vancouver, Coquitlam, Langley, Delta, New Westminster, and all of Metro Vancouver and Fraser Valley.
